project_info_text:
Allegro Residences by Mill Hill Developers is a flagship waterfront project redefining island living on Dubai Islands.

The G+8 residence blends architectural sophistication with coastal serenity, featuring 1-, 2- and 3-bedroom apartments that offer breathtaking skyline and sea views.
amenities_title: Infrastructure and landscaping of the residential complex
project_summary_title: Modern island homes by Mill Hill Developers
project_summary_subtitle: Luxury waterfront lifestyle in Dubai Islands
summary_developer_value: Mill Hill Developer presented by Abra Certified Properties
map_text:
Perfectly positioned on Dubai Islands, Allegro Residences offers quick access to the city’s most iconic destinations: only 10 minutes to Dubai International Airport, 16 minutes to Burj Khalifa, and 28 minutes to Dubai Marina.

Set amid beaches, parks, and promenades, the community delivers a balance of tranquility and connectivity, combining coastal charm with Dubai’s dynamic skyline.
